title: [GAMEPLAY] Aurelion Sol and fog of war
body: In my recent match, opposing aurelion sol was visible in fog of war almost all the time between 17 minute and end of them game which caused him to die. What's interesting is that he could hide in bushes and actually become invisible, but after coming out he appeared for everyone in my team again (my duo friend confirmed this).

replies.body:
Hey Finexia - 

Thanks for taking the time to report this! We're aware of the issue and are working to get a fix in for this ASAP.
happened in my game as well we could see aurelion do everything
